data.title: The Best Singer
data.meta_description: Who is the best panjabi singer of all time from back in the day, till now
data.text:
Post by george18 on

If you are going to put some idoit like puria or Juggy D create your own poll because this poll is for the true fans of panjbi music and not for people who insult panjabi music!

Post by kidterra on

Chamkilla, without a doubt, at his best he would murk mr Mann an day, i got alot of love for G MANN, but its all about chamkilla, bap, bap, and he wrote all his own songs which were on a social type......

Post by Bally83 on

The best ever singer is Kuldip Manak, amount of songs he's sang is countless, probably more than any other panjabi singer in the world.

But my favourite has to be the late great Surjit Bindrakhia.......

Post by kidterra on

chamkilla got shot down at the age of 26, he was a legend at THAT age, 20 years on and he's still 1 of the great names of punjabi music, who knows what he would have done if he was still alive...

Also i fink becoz he was young and gunned down, he has attained a cult following

Post by george18 on

I fogot to mention but NO WOMEN SINGERS because there all crap! apart from the ones like Jaspinder Narula, but the rest of you good choices! Keep them coming members i like it and i want to hear more!

Regards George18

Post by S on

No women singers cos they're all crap? Are u tryna tell me Gunjan is crap? Sheesh get your ears washed out lol!!

Gurdas Mann defo a LEGEND, and Gunjan is one of my favourite singers too! But I gota say one of my favourite female Punjabi singer is Jaspinder Narula.

Post by || M a s t e r K u n a l || on

Well i think Karan MC has one of the most powerful voice which stands out from the rest and his songs realy gets the crowd on the dance floor.. Do look out for his fourthcoming albums, as i myself feature on it as a vocalist. My song is called Mil Pa Ranjahna and the album is Official Desi Vol.1.. Look out 4 the vids on ZMusic aswel.. Master Kunal.

Post by devraj on

Well id have to say Gurdaas Mann and Malkit Singh are def up there somewhere. But till now also Lembher. He has a great voice on him, hence why hes on so many songs.

Kuldip Manak is sick aswell

Post by || M a s t e r K u n a l || on

masterkunal said:

Well i think Karan MC has one of the most powerful voice which stands out from the rest and his songs realy gets the crowd on the dance floor..

Do look out for his fourthcoming albums, as i myself feature on it as a vocalist. My song is called Mil Pa Ranjahna and the album is Official Desi Vol.1.. Look out 4 the vids on ZMusic aswel.. Master Kunal. Karan MC is the olnly singer to ever have a voice quality as close to Kuldip Manak than any other punjabi singer..

Post by sui9f4j9f34 on

For me its gotta be Gurdas Mann and Surjit Bindrakhia but i think Chamkila would have definitely been up there with these 2 if he didnt pass away when he did cos i think he was only 26 when he passed away.

Post by george18 on

Well i think Karan MC has one of the most powerful voice which stands out from the rest and his songs realy gets the crowd on the dance floor..

Do look out for his fourthcoming albums, as i myself feature on it as a vocalist. My song is called Mil Pa Ranjahna and the album is Official Desi Vol.1.. Look out 4 the vids on ZMusic aswel.. Master Kunal. Karan MC is the olnly singer to ever have a voice quality as close to Kuldip Manak than any other punjabi singer..

WOT THE FCUK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Yh he has a phat voice i admit that but there is no way he compares to Kuldip Manak! I dont think you realise how bad Manak is!!!! Not many people can do what Kuldip Manak did.

But thier are many good singers such as Balkar Sidhu, Akashdeep, peeps like these are phat now but back in da day it woz manz lyke Shinda, Manak, Yamla, Chamkilla, Bindrakhia

Post by || M a s t e r K u n a l || on

Oh n is that y all of Kuldip Manak's writers/ lyricists have given all copyrights of his songs to be sung by Karan MC!! Which is true, writers such as Dev Tarikeywala, one of Manak's favourite has honoured MC for his singing style such as with Manak's. He's probably not the greatest singer of all time YET but he surely will be remembered for years to come.. & all u people know he is much better than Manak E!!!
